column4: Hello... Whats the diference between Ubuntu & Kubuntu & Xubuntu & Mythbuntu????
Hello... Whats the diference between Ubuntu & Kubuntu & Xubuntu & Mythbuntu??????
Kubuntu uses KDE as a desktop, Xubuntu uses XFCE, Mythbuntu is usually a media computer OS, and Ubuntu uses Gnome
im a normal user... i dont know about Linux / Ubuntu Xubuntu or what ever... what should i instal on my machine ?
